question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/aggregator/aggregator_delete_action.move] [Function: actuate()] [Resource Leak] Does aggregator.delete() at line 26 properly clean up all nested resources (UpdateState.results vector, CurrentResult), or can deletion leave orphaned memory/storage consuming chain resources?
